00029 #include "ChasteNodesList.hpp"
00030 
00031 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00032 ChasteNodesList<SPACE_DIM>::ChasteNodesList(const std::vector<Node<SPACE_DIM>*> rNodesList, bool ownNodes)
00033     : mListOfNodes(rNodesList),
00034       mOwnNodes(ownNodes)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00039 ChasteNodesList<SPACE_DIM>::~ChasteNodesList()
00040 {
00041     if (mOwnNodes)
00042     {
00043         for (unsigned i=0; i<mListOfNodes.size(); i++)
00044         {
00045             delete mListOfNodes[i];
00046         }
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00051 bool ChasteNodesList<SPACE_DIM>::DoesContain(const ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rPointToCheck) const
00052 {
00053     bool returned_value = false;
00054     for (unsigned index = 0; index < mListOfNodes.size(); index++)
00055     {
00056         if (mListOfNodes[index]->GetPoint().IsSamePoint(rPointToCheck))
00057         {
00058             returned_value = true;
00059             break;
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063     return returned_value;
00064 }
00065 
00066 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00067 const std::vector< Node<SPACE_DIM>*>& ChasteNodesList<SPACE_DIM>::rGetNodesList() const
00068 {
00069     return mListOfNodes;
00070 }
00071 
00072 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00073 unsigned ChasteNodesList<SPACE_DIM>::GetSize() const
00074 {
00075     return mListOfNodes.size();
00076 }
00077 
00079 // Explicit instantiation
00081 
00082 template class ChasteNodesList<1>;
00083 template class ChasteNodesList<2>;
00084 template class ChasteNodesList<3>;
00085 
00086 // Serialization for Boost >= 1.36
00087 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00088 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(ChasteNodesList)
